data.message: What happened to the rest of D12? I never hear anything from them anymore. None of them have guest appeared on Ems latest albums after Proof died. And what happened to Ca$his, Bobby Creekwater and Stat Quo?

replies.message: There's a song by D12 on Shady XV called Bane but I have to say that this song sucks and Em is not in it
Song wasn't bad. Also what happened to all those cats is when em took his sudden hiatus all the people he put on and signed to shady records like D12, Ca$hi$, Bobby, Obie etc etc all got shafted.
New d12 mixtape with Eminem the 30th.. And as for the bobby creekwater, Obie and cashis situation they all fell through shady while em was having the pill issue
